Mongo like candy, but MongoDB also seems to like unstructured data. I am diving into MongoDB. Let's hope it doesn't blow up in my face like the infamous candygram.

As a refresher, MongoDB is a non-relation (NoSQL) database. In the grand scheme of things, there are a few types of these:

Type of DB Popular Example
Document-based Mongo
Key-value Redis
Column-based Cassandra
Graph Neo4J
